name: Orange Juice
description: Orange Juice is a game designed by ReMake Studios. Based on a sci-fi / fantasy story telling and an arcade-like game. Orange Juice showcases. The unknown character that carries an orange lit sword along side orange juice powers, making him powerful. But when one power is created, another rises in power. Blue Berry, produced and designed mirroring the powers of Orange Juice but with more complex traits within. This game took 8 months to make and created by one person. Hope you all enjoy!
